author: Rob Hill
comment: I've been using this app for a few years now. I must say the pro service is definitely worth it. I have one very minor complaint. i setup my account to only post to FB when I beat a personal best. Prior to 13 March the post would say I beat "x" personal best(s). However, it no longer does that. Now, it only posts that I completed an activity.

author: Mark Watkins
comment: So easy to start up and get moving, especially from my android wear device.  Only have two minor wishes...   My Moto360's inaccurate heart rate sensor is used on the watch display, when i have a Zephyr HXM connected. I'd rather the watches sensor wasn't switched on in this case.  I'd like to be able to send workouts to other apps, like MyFitnessPal for instance.
title: Love this app!

author: Rhaurison Bergamin
comment: Ver good app,  complete. I would give 5 stars if the training plans could be saved in my account, personal data as well. It is a waste of time every time I upgraded android or swap phone I have to create the training plans all over again.
title: Best so far

author: Michael Fedkiw
comment: Too bad there's zero support for this app now, it was always my favorite to use. It's like a roll of the dice whether it will connect to the heart rate monitor on a daily basis.
title: Heart rate doesn't always work.

author: Michael Newton
comment: I had problems with this app on lollipop, in particular voice feedback would stop after 5 mins (LP is aggressive in killing background tasks).  It is working fine on marshmallow however.  This is the only app that supports running cadence.  It has very good stats too.

author: A Google User
comment: Great app - MUCH more complete than its main competitors (I have tried them), though I have been trying to get an answer from the dev/his support team for over a month, not a single reply to 6 emails :(     Dropping from 5 to 2 starts as a result.  The app itself is excellent, does everything I want from a tracking app: easy start up and completion/uploading.      Well worth it, though I'm concerned about the lack of response from the dev - check it meets your requirements before buying.

author: Franco Fernando Pena Espinoza
comment: Needs update for Hxm smart Zephyr, keeps crashing Bluetooth also experience major spikes, unable to copy password into app? Contacted developer a few times no answer. Calorie equation must be wrong, 3400 cal in an 8 hour period?
title: A once great app

comment: The app works very well in tracking heart rate. I wish they had more detailed instructions about how to use the app. Also the number of calories burned showing on the app is always higher than the number of calories showing on the website after you upload the same workout. Sometimes the difference is as much as 100 calories. I don't know why this happens. But it is with every workout.  Is there something I am missing?

author: A Google User
comment: Tried the othets when St stopped for a while. Nothing filled the gap, so glad they could keep it going. UPDATE. Years later. Still using this. Still the best tracker on the market.

author: Boaz Hayes
comment: Heart rate monitor freezers almost straight away using huawei watch making the app useless for me. Very disappointed after costing so much. Hoping issue is resolved in update.
title: Useless with Huawei watch

author: A Google User
comment: Works well and does what it's supposed to do. Many features that others charge monthly for. I doubt you'll find a better app.
title: Keeps getting better

author: Thiago Farias
comment: Would be great to be able to edit before upload... Track trimming on website is not the best either.
title: Still missing track track trim in the app

author: A Google User
comment: I tried all the other gps trackers. This one is the most flexible when it comes to training based on heart rate. It also has many interesting options on gps precision.
title: Best for heart rate based training.

author: Paul Perminov
comment: Thanks a lot for Android wear support! Very nice and simple! Only one question/wish... Is it possible to add "HR% value" to the main watch screen in addition to existing parameters? It would be very convenient to have all the necessary parameters at hand and in one place. Thanks in advance!
title: You are the best

author: K Berkenkotter
comment: Have been using this for a couple of years.   Uploaded tracks are not showing up on calendar (no email confirmation either).  Website has little or no troubleshooting information.
title: Stopped uploading tracks to calendar

author: Alan Williams
comment: Exceptional app for tracking workouts and recording gpx tracks. The only fully compatible ant + app to show complete data without a subscription. Very happy with this.
title: Outstanding

author: Pan Talon
comment: It was great in 2015 then I bought Garmin triathlon run watch (920xt). Dev stopped developing app. Now it is dead...

author: Giampaolo Frello
comment: But horrible interface
title: Good functionalities

author: Steve Pearson
comment: The app will run for 5 minutes then crash. Need a fix!
title: Crashing

author: bren boll
comment: I have been using Sportstracklive for about 6 years now, sadly I have stopped as it doesn't seem to support HR any more. Try something else if you want to track HR and GPS tracks.

author: Sergey Shirobokov
comment: Чертовски не хватает русского языка, ну и может быть это особенность девайса,  периодически выдает нереальные цифры скорости в тех местах, где это просто невозможно.

author: Chris Collier
comment: Great for tracking my rides and seeing when I'm improving. Love the analytics and stats. Nice and easy to use.

author: Dimaz F.
comment: Voice feedback is extremely useful. Would've been 5 stars if it has metronome. Please consider add it.
title: I use it every run

author: Dan Dickens
comment: Have used many apps to track calories and HR during workouts - this is the best!

author: Andy Southern
comment: How to view recorded track logs? It used to be simple. Why do you change the interface so often?
title: Used to be better. How to view recorded track logs?

author: Jeffery Sumler
comment: I've been using this for about 4 years to track running/walking/biking. Super useful and really reliable.
title: Incredibly useful and reliable

author: Wayne Gifford
comment: Easy to set up, easy to read and download. Just what I needed
title: Great training tool

author: Gabor NAGY
comment: I like all its features, especially ANT+ capability!
title: Great app

author: Árpád Mihály
comment: Smart uncluttered look, great web service to boot.
title: Stylish and smart

author: Jukka Yrjönen
comment: But doesn't connect to BLE strap on Nougat anymore
title: Very versatile

author: Mark Felter
comment: I've been using this app for years with many different phones.
title: Great app.

author: Erik Carr
comment: Good all around app for indoors and out
title: Captures all workouts. Great app

author: sunil Ghorpade
comment: Best app. Go for paid version. Worth it

author: Jeremy Cheadle
comment: Very good app!
title: Love it

author: Jerry Frye
comment: Apparently abandoned

author: Robert Bryant
comment: Abandoned

author: A Google User
comment: These people could not be bothered to fix the basics of this application. Text that does not fit in boxes, voice feedback saying "1 seconds" instead of 1 second etc. Just plain lazy.
title: Useless Developers

author: Håkan Svensson
comment: I like the ui and the Web page, very exhaustive and flexible presentation of information with lots of customizations. Also connects very quickly to my Polar H7 HRM, which is the main reason I switched to this one, from a competitor :-) I'm using a Samsung S4 with Lollipop. Thanx a lot and keep up the good work! Oh and one more thing - it'd be great if you could subscribe to the Premium version via Google instead of PayPal, which I trust little!
title: Awesome!

author: A Google User
comment: Perfect for speed & distance on treadmill.   Calibrate in Wahoo Fitness app first. Use Wahoo Utility app running in background to connect this app to Tickr X otherwise you will not get speed or cadence only heart rate.
title: Tab S & Wahoo Tickr X Perfect

comment: I bought this app yesterday and it worked fine on the first time.  Now, I can't connect my Scosche Rythm+ HRM. On ANT+ it doesn't scan at all and on BLE BT, it scans, finds and connect, but when I go back to the previous screen it disconnect. And it doesn't connect again if I start a Scan Only or an Activity. Want my money back!!
title: I want my money back!
